title: Head Coach & QB most under pressure; Packers competition; Prospects rising; Quentin Lake
itunes:title: Head Coach & QB most under pressure; Packers competition; Prospects rising; Quentin Lake
description:
The latest edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast examines if the NFC North is still a one horse race. Hosts Kay Adams, Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt, and former Super Bowl champion Michael Robinson discuss if the Minnesota Vikings can compete with the Green Bay Packers in the NFC North (1:00). Then they explore which head coach and quarterback combo is under the most pressure (12:00). Later on, Peter Schrager shares 5 prospects that are on the rise in the upcoming NFL Draft (23:00). They finish up being joined by UCLA Bruins Quentin Lake and talks about his self-development and growth, his versatility, and why he went to a fortune teller (32:00).

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
